effect.x_y: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it. If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it. If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.

short_effect.x_y: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.

flavor_text.x_y: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.
